description:
Yuga and Masato prepare to face each other in the final round of the ABC Cup. But their pre-match interview takes an unexpected turn when the villainous PalTuber Da Dan makes an appearance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ABC Cup Finals! Yuga versus Masato!
ABC Cup Kesshou! Yuuga vs Masato!!
ABCカップ決勝! 友牙VSマサト!!
